episodes.title: Therapist reviews TikTok Cult 7m Dancing For the Devil| Understand Why People Join Cults
episodes.description:
Trauma Therapist reviews the documentary dancing for the devil on reflex where TikTok group 7M has members join their cult in the Shakina Church. Understand the psychology behind why some people become susceptible to cults and what the trauma does to the body. If you've ever wondered how cults operate and why people join them, this episode is a must-watch. I'll also share a personal story about almost getting caught in a cult during my college years - a testament to how these things can happen to anyone.

Join the Community Text the word  "STRESS" to (860)401-0207

CHAPTERS:
0:00 - Intro
1:23 - What is the 7M Cult
3:09 - What happened to Miranda
6:12 - What happened to the creators
7:43 - Join the Less Stress Text Community
11:19 - How did Miranda get involved
12:58 - 7M Fees Explained
17:20 - Trauma Bonding in Cults
20:14 - This is not the first time we've heard of this
25:24 - My OWN Experience with a Cult
30:11 - How to Know if You Have an Insecure Attachment Style
30:27 -For the Culture:  What is an Obeah Man
31:09 - What do you think of the Documentary
